statements: SELECT * FROM women_rights_advocates_documents;
SELECT document_title, author_name, publication_year FROM women_rights_advocates_documents WHERE publication_year > 2000;
SELECT * FROM women_rights_advocates_documents WHERE document_type = 'Report' ORDER BY publication_year DESC;
SELECT id, document_title, author_name FROM women_rights_advocates_documents WHERE author_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT document_title, publication_year FROM women_rights_advocates_documents ORDER BY publication_year ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM women_rights_advocates_documents WHERE document_type = 'Article' AND publication_year >= 2010 ORDER BY publication_year DESC
SELECT document_title, author_name, publication_year FROM women_rights_advocates_documents WHERE author_name LIKE '%Alice%'
SELECT document_title, publication_year FROM women_rights_advocates_documents WHERE archived_date IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT author_name) AS num_authors FROM women_rights_advocates_documents WHERE publication_year < 2005
SELECT document_title, document_type, publication_year FROM women_rights_advocates_documents WHERE document_title LIKE 'Women%' ORDER BY document_type ASC
SELECT * FROM WomenRightsAdvocates WHERE occupation = 'Activist';
SELECT name, birth_date FROM WomenRightsAdvocates ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM WomenRightsAdvocates WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalDocuments WHERE publication_date > '1900-01-01';
SELECT document_id, title, author FROM HistoricalDocuments ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT * FROM WomenRightsAdvocates WHERE birth_date = '1990-01-01';
SELECT name, occupation FROM WomenRightsAdvocates WHERE occupation IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM WomenRightsAdvocates ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM WomenRightsAdvocates WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT author, title, publication_date FROM HistoricalDocuments WHERE publication_date >= '1800-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalDocuments WHERE publication_year < 1800;
SELECT document_title, author FROM HistoricalDocuments ORDER BY author ASC;
SELECT advocate_name, birth_year, death_year FROM WomenAdvocates WHERE birth_year >= 1900 ORDER BY birth_year DESC;
SELECT speech_title, speaker_name, event_date FROM Speeches WHERE event_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY event_date;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalDocuments WHERE author LIKE 'Jane%'
SELECT * FROM HistoricalDocuments WHERE publication_year > 1800;
SELECT document_title, author FROM HistoricalDocuments WHERE author LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY publication_year DESC;
SELECT advocate_name, birth_year, death_year FROM WomenAdvocates ORDER BY birth_year;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalDocuments WHERE document_id = 10;
SELECT speaker_name, speech_title, event_date FROM Speeches WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE document_author = 'John Smith';
SELECT document_title, document_author FROM documents ORDER BY document_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM speeches WHERE speech_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT speaker_name, speech_title FROM speeches WHERE speech_date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT advocate_name, advocate_birthdate FROM advocates WHERE advocate_country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE document_author = 'John Doe'
SELECT document_title, document_author FROM documents WHERE document_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM speeches ORDER BY speech_date DESC
SELECT speaker_name, speech_title FROM speeches WHERE speech_transcript LIKE '%freedom%'
SELECT * FROM advocates WHERE advocate_country = 'USA'
SELECT * FROM historical_documents ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT document_title, author_name FROM historical_documents WHERE author_name = 'Jane Doe';
SELECT document_title, publication_date FROM historical_documents WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2000-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT * FROM speeches WHERE speaker_name = 'John Smith' ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT advocate_name, advocacy_topic FROM advocates WHERE birth_date < '1970-01-01';
SELECT * FROM historical_documents WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT document_title, author_name FROM historical_documents WHERE author_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT document_text FROM historical_documents ORDER BY publication_date DESC
SELECT * FROM speeches WHERE delivery_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY speaker_name ASC
SELECT speaker_name, COUNT(*) AS num_speeches FROM speeches GROUP BY speaker_name HAVING num_speeches > 1
